name: Don't Leaf Me Behind
description:
In this 2-D platformer, our main character has found themselves losing their leaves! Oh yeah, and they're also a tree. Using your platforming skill get to the end of the levels and save as many of the leaves as possible.

Most of the textures were created by taking photographs of everyday items that I captured myself. It gives this game a very *unique* look that may not be replicated! 

Also, this is my second Game Jam and my first game made in Unreal!
